physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Marked pectus deformity with a straight back appearance. Heart sounds normal, Grade II out of VI systolic ejection murmur at left sternal border. No jugular venous distention or peripheral edema.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Blood pressure drop and pulse wave amplitude decrease documented during tilt table testing.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: ECG showed an incomplete right bundle-branch block. Pulmonary function testing revealed a restrictive pattern: vital capacity 2.50 L (66% of predicted), total lung capacity 3.32 L (65% of predicted).
Postoperative chest CT scan revealed no IVC compression during maximal expiration and improvement in minimal expiratory thoracic depth from 1.2 cm to 5.7 cm.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Significant improvement in thoracic dimensions post-surgery.
